subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Although it does not draw the top golfers it once did, the Met Open, which will be played this week for the 100th time, has had champions including Walter Hagen, Gene Sarazen, Tommy Armour and Craig Wood.
snippet: Although it does not draw the top golfers it once did, the Met Open, which will be played this week for the 100th time, has had champions including Walter Hagen, Gene Sarazen, Tommy Armour and Craig Wood.
